name: MS Teams Meetings
description: MS Teams Meetings audio and video conferencing plugin for Mattermost 5.2+.

settings.help_text: Copy the **Directory (tenant) ID** value from the App Overview Page in the Azure Portal.
Copy the 'Application (client) ID' value from the App Overview Page in the Azure Portal.
Copy the `Client Secret` value (not ID) that was created on the App's `Certificates and Secrets` tab

settings_schema.header: Please refer to installation instructions [**here**](https://app.gitbook.com/@mattermost/s/microsoft-teams-pluginmsteams-meetings-plugin/setup/installation-and-configuration) for creating a new Application in the Azure Portal.
